name: 數學教學中的英語
comment: 本課程為「雙語教學師資培育課程」數學領域數學專長之必修課程。
description: 數學教學字彙和語言使用，以及教學性對話式英語語言技能發展
goals: Learn common sentence and ques-tion structures.
Learn typical confusions for math-ematical English and everyday English
syllabus:
(3 weeks) Vocabulary, pronunciation, andsentence and question structures

(2 weeks) Confusions in everyday andmathematical english

(3 weeks) Presentation of assignments, spokenand written

(1 weeks) Presentation of multiple solutions

(2 weeks) Discussion of different methods andalternatives

(2 weeks) Diagnostic questioning

(5 weeks) Deep case study collaborative assignmentwith individual, reports and presentations

methodologies.note: Students will explain and discuss their ideas and solutions to problems with other students. In english as well as Chinese
Students will write high school mathematics problems and produce solutions in english
Deep case study collaborative assignment with individual, reports and presentations.
They will demonstrate ability to explain and discuss mathematics education issues in individual face to face assessments with the instructor.
